text: is a private junior college attached to Asahikawa University in Asahikawa, Hokkaidō, Japan. It was established in 1964 as a women's college, and became coeducational in 2011. ==Departments== * Department of Home Economics * Department of Childcare ==See also == * List of junior colleges in Japan ==External links== * Category:Japanese junior colleges Category:Universities and colleges in Hokkaido
title: Asahikawa University Junior College
